Color_Diagonals: Color Diagonals (#): Count of diagonally adjacent same color dice
Row_Shade_Variety: Row Shade Variety (5): Rows with no repeated values
Row_Color_Variety: Row Color Variety (6): Rows with no repeated colors
Color_Variety: Color Variety (4): Sets of one of each color anywhere
Light_Shades: Light Shades (2): Sets of 1 & 2 values anywhere
Medium_Shades: Medium Shades (2): Sets of 3 & 4 values anywhere
Dark_Shades: Dark Shades (2): Sets of 5 & 6 values anywhere
Shade_Variety: Shade Variety (5): Sets of one of each value anywhere
Column_Color_Variety: Column Color Variety (5): Columns with no repeated colors
Column_Shade_Variety: Column Shade Variety (4): Columns with no repeated values
